code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Admin from"./Components/DashBoard/Admin.js";import LoginPage from"./Components/LoginPage/LoginPage";import MainPage from"./Components/MainPage/Page.js";import SignUpPage from"./Components/SignupPage/signUp.js";import"./appstyle.css";import"./Components/LoginPage/styles.css";import"./Components/MainPage/styles.css";import"./Components/DashBoard/admin.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[view,setView]=useState("landing");const[isSignUpActive,setIsSignUpActive]=useState(false);const handleSignInSuccess=()=>{setView("dashboard");};const handleSignOut=()=>{setView("landing");};const containerClass="container ".concat(isSignUpActive?"right-panel-active":"");return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:view==="landing"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MainPage,{setView:setView}):view==="dashboard"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Admin,{onSignOut:handleSignOut}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:containerClass,id:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SignUpPage,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginPage,{onSignInSuccess:handleSignInSuccess}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overlay-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"overlay",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"overlay-panel overlay-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Welcome Back!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"To keep connected with the Placement team"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"ghost",id:"signIn",onClick:()=>setIsSignUpActive(false),children:"Sign In"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"overlay-panel overlay-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Hello, Friend!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"To join with The Rajalakshmi's Placement team"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"ghost",id:"signUp",onClick:()=>setIsSignUpActive(true),children:"Sign Up"})]})]})})]})});};export default App;
